reviewText: This DVD is about Sifu Wong's family and top students demostration in weapons, forms, and kung fu workout. There was also interviews with Sifu Wong and his wife. Some candid clips were added in. Watching a movies would be more exciting and entertaining. BUY ONLY if you are fan of Sifu Wong OR got extra money to spare.
Very exciting and entertaining. Professionally directed. I need to look for other works directed by Stuart Richman. The weapons and action are incredible. Two thumbs way up on this master piece.
